credit_line: Museum purchase through gift of various donors and from Eleanor G. Hewitt Fund
title: Plate 8 of a set of illustrations of an as yet unidentified descroption of a pageant on a church fiesta day
provenance: Giovanni Piancastelli; Mrs. Edward D. Brandegee
description: The Virgin with the Child stands upon the neck of a dragon.  In a paper scroll:  "Drago della Confraternita della Visitati on presso S. Agostino a car.  96. n 24".  Left corners, top: "8"; bottom; signature similar to -8549
name: Print
